definition: the characteristics and circumstances particular to a country/current state of a country

sentences.english: Seventhly, the two sides reiterated respecting the road of development each other has chosen according to its own national conditions.
sentences.chinese: 雙方重申，尊重對方根據本國國情選擇的發展道路。

sentences.english: President George Bush delivers his last state-of-the-union address.
sentences.chinese: 布希總統發表最後一次國情諮文。

sentences.english: Sukh Sagar Indian Restaurant serves exotic Vegetarian Cuisine from India.
sentences.chinese: Sukh薩加爾印度餐廳印度提供異國情調的素食。

sentences.english: It is a training center, like a carrier, for chain stores for iron art forging.
sentences.chinese: 是符合我國國情的鐵藝鍛打加盟培訓業的航空母艦。

sentences.english: Scrumptious Cakes make an exotic Thanksgiving Gift for dear ones.
sentences.chinese: 美味的蛋糕是一份充滿異國情調的禮物。

sentences.english: Do you think Hong Kong will be successful in promoting National Education?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲香港能成功推行國情教育嗎？

sentences.english: What is your opinion on National Education?
sentences.chinese: 你對國情教育有什麼看法？

sentences.english: " Mao and the natural and exotic " girl " in this exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 毛島的自然和異國情調的女孩在這個畫廊。

sentences.english: My last State of the Union address was a joy to deliver.
sentences.chinese: 發表最後一個國情諮文演講時，我的心情很好。

sentences.english: “I was thinking more in terms of a fancy French restaurant, ” I replied.
sentences.chinese: “我更多想到的是異國情調的法國飯店，”我回答說。

sentences.english: More population with less land is the special situation of our country.
sentences.chinese: 人多地少，是我國的特殊國情。

sentences.english: No, I have never vacationed anywhere exotic .
sentences.chinese: 沒有，我從未去有異國情調的地方度過假。

sentences.english: The different national condition, has decided the Non-profit organization social marketing barrier difference.
sentences.chinese: 不同的國情，決定了非營利組織社會營銷障礙的不同。

sentences.english: President Obama’s State of the Union address was a ho-hum affair.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬總統的國情諮文講話是一件乏味無聊的事件。

sentences.english: The film retains much of the book's exotic flavour.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影保存了原着的許多異國情調。

sentences.english: Chinese English education policies are in conformity with its national conditions and have been proved to be workable in practice.
sentences.chinese: 中國英語教育政策符合國情，實踐證明是行之有效的。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
